name: HOG: Rooms
description:
A simple game in the style of "Hidden objects". The game is simple mechanics and simple rules. The game takes place in the living rooms like children's room, kitchen, living room, bedroom and bathroom. You have to find all hidden objects that were neatly scattered around the room and well camouflaged, so it is difficult to find. Will have to try hard to find the desired object from the list. Game is useful for developing mindfulness and memory.

Features of game:
► A lots of rooms
► A lots of hidden objects for search
► Different game modes (search by text of picture)
► The game has a Hint

Attention, the game for a long time to boot. The game not freezes. Please wait a moment!

Happy playing!
